vulnerability.name: SQL Injection in Login Form
vulnerability.desc: The login form is vulnerable to SQL injection attacks. An attacker can bypass authentication by injecting SQL commands through the username parameter.
vulnerability.resolution: Implement parameterized queries and input validation

vulnerability.name: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in Search Function
vulnerability.desc: Reflected XSS vulnerability in the search functionality allows attackers to execute arbitrary JavaScript in victim browsers.

vulnerability.name: Weak TLS Configuration
vulnerability.desc: Server supports TLS 1.0 and TLS 1.1 which are deprecated and vulnerable to cryptographic attacks.

vulnerability.name: Broken Authentication - Missing JWT Validation
vulnerability.desc: API endpoints do not properly validate JWT tokens, allowing attackers to forge authentication tokens.

vulnerability.name: API Rate Limiting Not Implemented
vulnerability.desc: Critical API endpoints lack rate limiting, exposing the service to denial of service attacks.
